thread.title: Silversea Cruises begins work on Silver Muse
thread.title_full: Silversea Cruises begins work on Silver Muse

title: Silversea Cruises begins work on Silver Muse
text:
Silversea Cruises begins work on Silver Muse 28 July 2015 Save 
Construction has begun on Silversea Cruises latest ship, Silver Muse at Fincantieri’s shipyard in Genoa, Italy. 
The line’s new flagship vessel will debut in the spring of 2017. The steel cutting follows extensive planning and development of new concepts to enhance the on-board experience. 
“The start of construction of Silver Muse is a very proud occasion for us. Silver Muse is the only ship with 40,700 grt and less than 300 suites to be launched in the ultra-luxury segment in the coming years,” said chairman Manfredi Lefebvre d’Ovidio.
